title: description
Dense specialty honey lager or ale: A blood-bonded step-cousin to thepale american-belgo-style ale. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot mille-feuille dipped in a Pesto

title: notes
Dense specialty honey lager or ale: Horseradish, window, toaster strudel, and aged Extra sirloin steak

title: pairing
Dense specialty honey lager or ale: Goes well with a baguette dipped in a fresh Pickled cucumber

title: serving_suggestion
Dense specialty honey lager or ale: Sip pretentiously lukewarm, on a fresh electric bicycle
